title: Alpaca
summary: The alpaca (Lama pacos) is a species of South American camelid mammal. It is similar to, and often confused with, the llama. However, alpacas are often noticeably smaller than llamas. The two animals are closely related and can successfully crossbreed. Both species are believed to have been domesticated from their wild relatives, the vicu√±a and  guanaco. There are two breeds of alpaca: the Suri alpaca and the Huacaya alpaca.
